'''Blessings Never Come in Pairs...''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to [[Saurian Indwelling|indwell]] a [[Tepetlisaurus]], [[Yumkasaurus]] or [[Tatankasaurus]], then trigger at least 3 explosions from unstable [[Phlogiston]] crystals.

It is also possible to achieve the achievement during the [[Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame (Quest)|Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame]] Step 4 without being indwelled.
